table.name: vtiger_addisa
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_addisa` ( `addisaid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `newpolicynumber` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `addrelatedclient` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `newunitvalue` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `newnumberofunits` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `newcurrentamount` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `date` date DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_addisacf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_addisacf` ( `addisaid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`addisaid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
